mapper.insert: insert into cart (user_id, p_id, amount, p_size) values (#{uid}, #{pid}, #{camount}, #{psize})
mapper.select: select c.user_id, c.p_id, c.p_size, c.amount, p.p_name, p.p_price, photos.photo_id, photos.photo_oname, photos.photo_sname, photos.photo_type, photos.photo_role from cart c, products p, photos where c.user_id = #{uid} and c.p_id = p.p_id and p.p_id = photos.p_id and photos.photo_role = 'main'
mapper.update: update cart set amount = amount+1 where user_id=#{uid} and p_id=#{pid}
update cart set amount = amount-1 where user_id=#{uid} and p_id=#{pid}
